name: Mahjong Goraku: Bishoujo Meijinsen
overview: As the red-haired girl in the title, you challenge four other girls to strip mahjongg. Strip scenes take place at certain intervals of points, for both you and your opponent. You only have so many rounds to play before a winner is decided automatically and the game returns you to the menu, and if you won by decision, the game won't allow you to play against the same girl again without resetting.
